trans-unit.source: Provides numerous conversion functions and exposes a GDI+ <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce numerose funzioni di conversione ed espone un oggetto GDI+ <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />.

trans-unit.source: This class provides numerous conversion functions and also exposes a GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe fornisce funzioni di conversione numerosi ed espone inoltre un GDI+ <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Note that when rendering as Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), use of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object for custom drawing will not be included as part of the SVG document.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che durante il rendering come Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG), uso del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> dell'oggetto per il disegno personalizzato non saranno incluso come parte del documento SVG.

trans-unit.source: Note also that, by default, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> functions usually take absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che, per impostazione predefinita, <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> funzioni accettano in genere le coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the conversion methods of this class should be useful if you perform drawing operations.
trans-unit.target: I metodi di conversione di questa classe devono pertanto essere utili se si eseguono operazioni di disegno.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics> object is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> class, which makes it easy to perform custom drawing in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartGraphics> oggetto esposto nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs.ChartGraphics%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> (classe), che rende più semplice eseguire il disegno personalizzato nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> eventi.

trans-unit.source: If significant changes are made to the default behavior of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, the chart image and its associated elements may be drawn erratically.
trans-unit.target: Se vengono apportate modifiche significative al comportamento predefinito del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> dell'oggetto, l'immagine del grafico e gli elementi associati possono essere disegnati in modo errato.

trans-unit.source: For example, positioning may be altered.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il posizionamento può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: It is highly recommended that you become well acquainted with GDI+ before you make any significant changes to the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile che sia esperti di GDI+ prima di apportare modifiche significative alle proprietà del <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="True" /> to release both unmanaged and managed resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="True" /> per rilasciare sia le risorse non gestite sia quelle gestite; <see langword="false" /> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite e, facoltativamente, quelle gestite.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> e ne converte le coordinate relative in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object and converts its relative coordinates to absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> e ne converte le coordinate relative in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object that uses relative coordinates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object that uses absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> che utilizza coordinate relative e restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> che utilizza coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Chart area name.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'area grafico.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName" /> enumeration value that identifies the relevant axis.
trans-unit.target: Valore dell'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AxisName" /> che identifica l'asse pertinente.

trans-unit.source: The axis value to be converted to a relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Valore dell'asse da convertire a un valore in pixel relativo.

trans-unit.source: Takes a given axis value for a specified axis and returns the relative pixel value.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un dato valore dell'asse per un asse specificato e restituisce il valore in pixel relativo.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the converted axis value, in relative pixel coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Valore <see langword="string" /> che rappresenta il valore dell'asse convertito, in coordinate di pixel relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object that uses absolute coordinates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> che utilizza coordinate assolute e restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> che utilizza coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that is using absolute coordinates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> che utilizza coordinate assolute e restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> che utilizza coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object in absolute coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> in coordinate assolute.

trans-unit.source: Takes a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object in absolute coordinates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object that uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Accetta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> in coordinate assolute e restituisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> che utilizza coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> object in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> in coordinate relative.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a GDI+ <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object that can be used for drawing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto GDI+ <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> che può essere utilizzato a scopo di disegno.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> object used for drawing.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> utilizzato per disegnare.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to perform any custom drawing that can be performed using GDI+.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per eseguire un disegno personalizzato che può essere eseguita mediante GDI+.
